I am always striving to improve myself.
i like to take my dog for long walks.

participant_2.background:
I'm a mystery movie fan and a baker.
my father died when i was 2.
i need to use an inhaler sometimes.
I have a close relationship with my family despite my hectic schedule.
I want a home with a big yard for my dogs to run and play in.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing good! Just working on a mystery novel.
Oh nice! I love mysteries! What's it about?
It's about a baker who is found dead in his bakery.
Wow, that sounds like a great story! How did you come up with the idea for it?
I've always loved mystery novels and I've always wanted to be a baker. So I just combined the two!
That's awesome! I'm sure it's a great book! What's your favorite part of writing it?
I think my favorite part is coming up with the plot and characters. It's so much fun to create a whole new world!
I bet! I love writing too, but I'm not very good at it.
Don't worry, everyone has to start somewhere! Just keep practicing and you'll get better.
No problem! And good luck with your novel!
